name: Blaze Rod
desc: A staff specialized in creating and controlling crackling flames.
effect: Gain 1 _Arcana_ on a _Hit_, or 2 on a _Crit_.
special: This _Weapon_ may not be used to _Attack_ while _Puppeting_ it, and may only be used by a creature with at least one ability with the _Blaze_ type.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target within _Range_ and gain 2 _Arcana_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the _Target_, adding _Alight_ [5 _Reflex_] on a _Hit_ or _Alight_ [6 _Reflex_] on a _Crit_.

parry: Gain _Resistance_ I (_Fire_, _Ice_).

name: Iron Dagger
desc: A small blade capable of sudden assaults and being thrown.
parry: Gain +1 _Reflex_.

analysis_notes.notes: Gambit worth 2 Momentum, 16% chance for a 10, really only 11% matters because two 5s is already a Gambit

name: Iron Shortsword
desc: A light blade that offers a balance between power and speed.
special: You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to use this _Weapon_ as a _Light_ Attack. If you do, do not resolve the Effect.
parry: Gain +1 _Reflex_. If the triggering Attack is _Light_/_Versatile_, gain 1 _Block_.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target, making note of any remaining Movement you have. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Move [_Rush_] up to half the Movement you had remaining, then Attack the Target. On a _Graze_+ deal +2 _Damage_.

analysis_notes.notes: Expanded crit range and gaining Momentum on attack.

name: Iron Longsword
desc: A sword that can easily be used in one or both hands and grants unparalleled flexibility.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target, making note of any remaining Movement you have. While _Charging_ this Weapon is _Occupied_ and you gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Move [_Rush_] up to half the Movement you had remaining, then Attack the Target. On a _Graze_+ deal +4 _Damage_.

parry: Gain +1 _Reflex_ and 1 _Block_.

name: Iron Greatsword
desc: A massive blade meant to be wielded in both hands, this weapon can cleave through most defenses.
parry: Gain +1 _Reflex_, _Sturdy_ 1, and 1 _Block_.

charged_profile.set_up: Create a _Self_-Range _Arc_ 2 _Hazard_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack in the _Hazard_. Add [_Overwhelming_].

name: Iron Handaxe
desc: A lightweight axe that weighs enough to punish a foe's defenses while allowing for swift strikes.
parry: Gain _Sturdy_ 1.

name: Iron Battleaxe
desc: A powerful melee tool that cleaves through a foe's attempts to defend.
parry: Gain _Sturdy_.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target within _Range_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the Target, adding [_Overwhelming_]. Deal +4 Damage on a _Graze_+. On a _Hit_+, add _Sundered_ [5 _Grit_/_Reflex_]. On a _Crit_, add _Sundered_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Iron Greataxe
desc: A mighty axe wielded in two hands that crushes through all defenses, driving foes into the dirt.

charged_profile.set_up: Create a _Self_-Range _Cone_ 3/_Arc_ 2 _Hazard_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack in the _Hazard_. Add [_Overwhelming_]. On a _Hit_+, add _Exposed_, _Sundered_ [6 _Grit_/_Reflex_]. On a _Crit_, increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

parry: Gain _Sturdy_ 1 and 1 _Block_.

name: Iron Mace
desc: A simple weapon with a heavy, weighted head.
charged_profile: Deal +2 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overwhelming_ 1, _Pierce_ 1].
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 1 _Instant Guard_.
* Reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Iron Warhammer
desc: A heavy weapon that disregards all but the heaviest of armors.
charged_profile: Deal +3 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overwhelming_ 1, _Pierce_ 1]. Additionally, this Weapon becomes _Reach_ 2.
parry: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Stone Maul
desc: A heavy stone at the end of a haft useful for causing massive damage.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a _Target_ within _Range_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the _Target_. Add [_Overwhelming_]. On a _Hit_+, add _Exposed_, _Sundered_. On a _Crit_, increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

parry: Gain _Sturdy_ and 1 _Block_.

name: Iron Maul
desc: A weapon of sheer mass that pushes through armor and defenses alike to punish foes.
charged_profile: Deal +4 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Overwhelming_ 1, _Pierce_ 1]. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Cone_ 2/_Arc_ 1.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 2 _Instant Guard_.
* Reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Small Improvised
desc: A small weapon that could easily be fit in a hand, such as a stone or bottle.
parry: If the triggering Attack is _Light_ gain 1 _Instant Guard_.

name: Medium Improvised
desc: An object that is light enough to be wielded in one hand, such as a chair or tree branch.
parry: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_.

name: Large Improvised
desc: A weapon large enough to require two hands, such as a table or heavy stone.
parry: Gain 2 _Instant Guard_.

name: Iron Javelin
desc: A light spear that lacks the range of other lance weapons but can easily be flung to harry foes.
effect: Create an _Opening_ when making a _Ranged Attack_ with this.
parry: Gain a +1 to _Negate_ if the Attacker is within this Weapon's _Reach_.

name: Iron Spear
desc: Perhaps the most common weapon in the world, a spear allows consistent strikes at range while controlling a foe's movement.
charged_profile: On a _Graze_+, deal +1 Damage. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Line_ 2.
parry: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_ and a +1 to _Negate_ if the Attacker is within this Weapon's _Reach_.

name: Iron Pike
desc: A powerful weapon with unparalleled reach and the weight to deal heavy damage to foes.
charged_profile: On a _Graze_+, deal +2 Damage. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Line_ 4 and add [_Pierce_ 1].
parry: Gain 2 _Instant Guard_ and a +1 to _Negate_ if the Attacker is within this Weapon's _Reach_.

name: Recurve Bow
desc: A lighter bow that can be short from a variety of positions, allowing faster shots and close-quarters capabilities.
parry:
Gain the following benefits if the triggering _Attack_ is _Light_/_Versatile_:
* Reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Shortbow
desc: A bow that is equally in place hunting game and on the battlefield.
charged_profile: Add [_Arcing_] and deal +2 Damage on a _Hit_+.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Longbow
desc: A heavy bow that has unparalleled range and power, allowing deadly strikes from extreme range.
charged_profile: Add [_Arcing_, _Pierce_ 1] and deal +3 Damage on a _Hit_+.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce the _Value_ of _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Sling
desc: A simple weapon with a windup that pierces through many defenses.

charged_profile.set_up: This Attacks' Range becomes _Medium_/_Long_. Choose a Target with _Range_.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the _Target_. Add [_Pierce_ 1] and deal +3 Damage.

special: Only the ammunition used for this Attack is _Earth_; the weapon itself is _Organic_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: This is instead a _Light_ Attack. Do not resolve the Effect.
parry: None.

name: Heavy Sling
desc: A simple weapon with a windup that pierces through many defenses.
charged_profile: Add [_Pierce_ 2] and deal +2 Damage on a _Hit_+.
special: You may choose to make a _Melee_ Attack with this. If you do, use the stats of a _Small Improvised_ Weapon.
parry: None.

name: Iron Buckler
desc: A small shield specialized for melee combat.
parry: Gain 1 _Instant Guard_, +1 _Grit_/_Reflex_, and reduce any _Stun_ inflicted by 1. If the Attack was Ranged, instead gain 2 _Instant Guard_, +2 _Grit_/_Reflex_, and reduce any _Stun_ inflicted by 2.

name: Round Shield
parry: Gain 2 _Block_, +1 _Grit_/_Reflex_, and reduce any _Stun_ inflicted by 2. If the Attack was not Melee, instead gain 4 _Instant Guard_, +2 _Grit_/_Reflex_, and reduce any _Stun_ inflicted by 4.

name: Heater Shield
parry: Gain _Resistance_ I against the triggering Attack. If the Attack was Ranged, instead gain _Resistance_ II.

name: Pavise Shield
special: You may, as a 1 AP _Action_, stop _Wielding_ this _Weapon_ and plant it in the ground. Create the _Planted Shield_ _Feature_ in that space and immediately use its _Interact_ at no cost. You may _Retrieve_ this _Weapon_ as normal, removing the _Feature_ in the process.
parry: Gain 4 _Instant Guard_, +2 _Grit_/_Reflex_, and reduce any _Stun_ inflicted by 4. If the Attack was Ranged, instead gain 6 _Instant Guard_, +3 _Grit_/_Reflex_, and reduce any _Stun_ inflicted by 6.

name: Small Jaws
desc: A natural weapon for light fangs, mandibles, or pincers.
parry: If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -2 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 7.
special: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on _Attack Rolls_ and add [_Pierce_ 1] against creatures _Grabbed_ by this _Weapon_.

name: Medium Jaws
desc: A natural weapon for average fangs, mandibles, or pincers.
charged_profile: Deal +2 Damage on a _Graze_+ and add [_Pierce_ 1].
parry: If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -2 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 7.
special: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on _Attack Rolls_ and add [_Pierce_ 1] against creatures _Grabbed_ by this _Weapon_. If a creature is already _Grabbed_ by this Weapon and you would inflict _Grabbed_ again, instead inflict _Prone_.

name: Large Jaws
desc: A natural weapon for heavy fangs, mandibles, or pincers.

charged_profile.set_up: Make an Attack against a _Target_, dealing half Damage. If the Target is not _Grabbed_ by this Weapon after this, do not become _Charging_, and _Charging_ immediately ends if the _Grab_ does.
charged_profile.resolution: Deal Damage again, dealing +3 _Bonus Damage_ and adding [_Pierce_ 2]. Inflict _Sundered_ [8 _Grit_], but you must target the creature's _Armor_.

parry: Gain +1 _Grit_.
effect: Creatures _Grabbed_ by this _Weapon_ take 3 [_Natural_, _Stab_/_Crush_] Damage when they attempt to escape the _Grabbed_.
special: If a creature is already _Grabbed_ by this Weapon add [_Pierce_ 1].

name: Small Stinger
desc: A small natural weapon suitable for stingers, barbs, and needles.
parry: Gain 1 _Block_ and inflict 1 [_Stab_, _Natural_] Damage on the Attacker if they are within _Range_.

name: Medium Stinger
desc: A natural weapon suitable for stingers, barbs, and needles.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target within _Range_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the _Target_ and another _Target_ at your _Position_, adding [_Glancing_].

parry: Gain 1 _Block_ and inflict 2 [_Stab_, _Natural_] Damage on the Attacker if they are within _Range_.

name: Large Stinger
desc: A heavy natural weapon suitable for stingers, barbs, and needles.
charged_profile: Instead, make this Attack in a _Self_-Range _Line_ 2 and add _Bleeding_ 1 on a _Graze_+.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 2 _Instant Guard_.
* If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -1 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 5.

name: Small Claws
desc: A small natural weapon suitable for claws, talons, and other shredding attacks.
parry: Gain +1 _Reflex_.

name: Medium Claws
desc: A natural weapon suitable for claws, talons, and other shredding attacks.
parry: Gain +1 _Reflex_ and 1 _Block_.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target within your _Arena_. If you have any _Move_ remaining this _Turn_, mark it. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: You may use your marked _Move_ and any additional to immediately _Move_ towards the _Target_. If they are within _Range_, resolve this Attack against the _Target_. Deal +2 _Damage_ on a _Graze_+ and add _Bleeding_ [6 _Reflex_].

name: Large Claws
desc: A heavy natural weapon suitable for claws, talons, and other shredding attacks.
charged_profile: Deal +1 _Damage_ on a _Graze_+. Make this _Attack_ in a _Self_-Range _Cone_ 2/_Arc_ 1.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 2 _Instant Guard_.
* If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -1 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 6.

name: Small Coil
desc: A small natural weapon suitable for tentacles, coiling tails, and serpentine bodies.
parry: Gain 1 _Block_.

name: Medium Coil
desc: A natural weapon suitable for tentacles, coiling tails, and serpentine bodies.
special: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on _Attack Rolls_ against creatures _Grabbed_ by this Weapon. You may convert up to 2 _Stun_ to _Damage_ when attacking such a target.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a Target within _Range_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the _Target_, then make another Attack against them, adding [_Glancing_].

parry: Gain _Sturdy_ and 1 _Block_.

name: Large Coil
desc: A heavy natural weapon suitable for tentacles, coiling tails, and serpentine bodies.
special: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on _Attack Rolls_ against creatures _Grabbed_ by this Weapon and increase any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.
charged_profile:
Choose one:
* Do not inflict _Grabbed_. Resolve this Attack in a _Burst_ 2, and increase the _Pull_ by 2.
* After resovling this _Attack_, immediately make a [_Glancing_] Attack against the same Target. If they are _Grabbed_, remove _Glancing_. You may inflict _Exposed_ instead of _Pull_ with this secondary Attack.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain _Resistance_ 2 [_Forced Movement_].
* Gain 2 _Instant Guard_.

name: Small Smasher
desc: A small natural weapon suitable for crushing paws, heavy arms, and tails.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* If the triggering Attack is _Light_/_Versatile_, gain 1 _Instant Guard_.
* Reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.

name: Medium Smasher
desc: A natural weapon suitable for crushing paws, heavy arms, and tails.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Gain 1 _Instant Guard_.
* Reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.
charged_profile: Deal +1 Damage on a Graze+ and add [_Overwhelming_ 1, _Pierce_ 1].  Additionally, this Weapon becomes _Reach_ 2.

name: Large Smasher
desc: A heavy natural weapon suitable for crushing paws, heavy arms, and tails.
parry: Gain 2 _Block_ and +1 _Grit_.

charged_profile.set_up: Choose a _Target_ within _Range_. While _Charging_ gain the _Parry_ effect of this weapon.
charged_profile.resolution: Resolve this Attack against the _Target_. Add [_Overwhelming_] and deal +2 _Bonus Damage_ and _Bonus Stun_. On a _Graze_+, add _Prone_.

name: Small Horn
desc: A small natural weapon suitable for horns, antlers, and similar growths.
special: If used after moving at least 3 spaces with [_Rush_] Movement add _Push_ 1.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* If the triggering _Attack_ is _Light_/_Versatile_ reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.
* If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -1 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 6.

name: Medium Horn
desc: A natural weapon suitable for horns, antlers, and similar growths.
special: If used after moving at least 3 spaces with [_Rush_] Movement add _Push_ 1.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 1.
* If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -1 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 6.
charged_profile: Deal +1 Damage on a Graze+. On a _Hit_+, add _Angled Push_ 2.

name: Large Horn
desc: A heavy natural weapon suitable for horns, antlers, and similar growths.
special: If used after moving at least 3 spaces with [_Rush_] Movement add _Push_ 2.
parry:
Gain the following benefits:
* Reduce any _Vulnerable_ inflicted by 2.
* If the Attacker is within _Reach_ they must choose; either the Attack takes a -1 _Penalty_ or after resolving the triggering Attack make a _Weapon Attack_ against them with this _Weapon_. You automatically roll a 6.
charged_profile: Deal +1 Damage on a Graze+ and add [_Overwhelming_ 1]. On a _Hit_+, add _Angled Push_ 4/_Airborne_ [2 _Stamina_].
